content: Is there any paper written about leanblueprint that we can cite? The blog post is given in the repo of the program, and I can also cite github repo. But I wonder if there is a paper about it. I couldn't find!
There is no paper devoted to that topic. The sphere eversion project paper has a short section about it.

Patrick Massot said:

There is no paper devoted to that topic. The sphere eversion project paper has a short section about it.

And that's really a pity, @Patrick Massot !
